Articles.Content: so im tryin to build a resource generator that uses 1 or 2 types of resources to make another. starting to think its impossible

What you mean ? You can't get to work ?

EDIT- 

MODULE
{
	name = ModuleGenerator
	isAlwaysActive = false
        activateGUIName = activate Converter
        shutdownGUIName = Deactivate Converter
        INPUT_RESOURCE
	{
	    name = ****
	    rate = ***
	}
	OUTPUT_RESOURCE
	{
	   name = ********
	   rate = ***
	}	
}

You can add more INPUT RESOURCE and or OUTPUT RESOURCE and if you are making new resource thats not in any mod you need to make a RESOURCE_DEFINITION file 

RESOURCE_DEFINITION
{
  name = ********
  density = *
  unitCost = *
  flowMode = ALL_VESSEL
  transfer = PUMP
  isTweakable = true
}

Edited January 15, 2015 by Mecripp2
